attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We have few Accident & Emergency Departments in and around Staines, in Fact our nearest A&E is either Hounslow or St Peter's Hospital in Chertsey. Ashford Hospital no longer has an A&E department. We propse that the Prime Minister stop the proposal to close Ashford/St Peter's A&E Department with immediate effect. Patients need immediate care, but the distances needed to travel now are killing them

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
